textBox.richText: It’s time (again) to train our skills at writing down data flow equations. For this assignment allow two hours (120 consecutive minutes) Do as much as you can, but stop at the end of the alloted time. Grading will be based on the quality of your answer regardless of how far you got. In other words - if you can get full grade with only 20% of the assignment finished -- if what you have is correct. For E2, do Exercise 2.14, page 138 of PPA. Deadline next Friday.
